verses.verse: <S%G2547>And<s%> he <S%G450>arose<s%> from <S%G2547>thence<s%>, and <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the farther <S%G4008>side<s%> of <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4848>resort<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> he was <S%G1486>wont<s%>, he <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> came to <S%G4334>him<s%>, and <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, Is <S%G1487>it<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for a <S%G435>man<s%> to put <S%G630>away<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%>? <S%G3985>tempting<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> did Moses <S%G3475><s%> command <S%G1781><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> ?
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2010>suffered<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> a <S%G975>bill<s%> of <S%G647>divorcement<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to put her <S%G630>away<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, For <S%G4314><s%> the hardness <S%G4641><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G4641><s%> he wrote <S%G1125><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> precept <S%G1785><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> male <S%G730><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> female <S%G2338><s%> .

For this cause <S%G1752%G5127><s%> shall <S%G2641><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> cleave <S%G4347><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> ;

And <S%G2532><s%> they twain <S%G1417><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> one <S%G1519%G3391><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> : so then <S%G5620><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> twain <S%G1417><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> .
What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath joined together <S%G4801><s%> , let <S%G5563><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G444><s%> put asunder <S%G5563><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> matter.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Whosoever <S%G3739%G1437><s%> shall put away <S%G630><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> marry <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G243><s%> , committeth adultery <S%G3429><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> her <S%G846><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> shall put away <S%G630><s%> her <S%G846><s%> husband <S%G435><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> be married <S%G1060><s%> to another <S%G243><s%> , she committeth adultery <S%G3429><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> young <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> those that <S%G4374>brought<s%> them.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, he was much <S%G23>displeased<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> the little children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3362><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a little child <S%G3813><s%> , he shall <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> therein <S%G1519%G846><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1723>took<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> up in his <S%G1723>arms<s%>, <S%G5087>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when he was gone <S%G1607>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G846%G3598>way<s%>, there <S%G4370>came<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4370>running<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1120>kneeled<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> callest thou <S%G3004><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> good <S%G18><s%> ? there is none <S%G3762><s%> good <S%G18><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> , that is , God <S%G2316><s%> .

Thou knowest <S%G1492><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> , Do <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> , Do <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%> , Do <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%> , Do <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%> , Defraud <S%G650><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> , Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> have I <S%G5442>observed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3503>youth<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>beholding<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, One thing <S%G1520><s%> thou <S%G4671><s%> lackest <S%G5302><s%> : go thy way <S%G5217><s%> , sell <S%G4453><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> , take up <S%G142><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%> , and follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> he was <S%G4768>sad<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> that <S%G3056>saying<s%>, and went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3076>grieved<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192%G2258>had<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G2933>possessions<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> looked round <S%G4017>about<s%>, and <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> hardly <S%G1423><s%> shall they that have <S%G2192><s%> riches <S%G5536><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> !

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2284>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answereth<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, and <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Children <S%G5043><s%> , how <S%G4459><s%> hard <S%G1422><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> for them that trust <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> riches <S%G5536><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> !

It is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1525%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5168><s%> of a needle <S%G4476><s%> , than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> out of <S%G4057>measure<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438%G2532>themselves<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> then <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> looking <S%G1689>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, With <S%G3844><s%> men <S%G444><s%> it is impossible <S%G102><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> possible <S%G1415><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2400>Lo<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , There is <S%G2076><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> hath left <S%G863><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> lands <S%G68><s%> , for my <S%G1700><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the gospel's <S%G2098><s%> ,

But <S%G3362><s%> he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> an hundredfold <S%G1542><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> , houses <S%G3614><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> mothers <S%G3384><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> lands <S%G68><s%> , with <S%G3326><s%> persecutions <S%G1375><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> .
But <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that are first <S%G4413><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> .

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2258>went<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G2284>amazed<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> as they <S%G190>followed<s%>, they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> what things <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G4819>happen<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>,

<S%G3754>Saying<s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> , we go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto the chief priests <S%G749><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> unto the scribes <S%G1122><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> they shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G2288><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> :

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall mock <S%G1702><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall scourge <S%G3146><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall spit upon <S%G1716><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall kill <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%> .

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G4365>come<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, we <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%G4160>do<s%> for <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3739%G1437>whatsoever<s%> we shall <S%G154>desire<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> ye that I <S%G3165><s%> should do <S%G4160><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%> ?

<S%G1161><s%>They <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1325>Grant<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G2523>sit<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> left <S%G2176>hand<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye ask <S%G154><s%> : can ye <S%G1410><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> drink of <S%G4095><s%> ? and <S%G2532><s%> be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am baptized with <S%G907><s%> ?

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We <S%G1410>can<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye shall <S%G4095><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> drink of <S%G4095><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am baptized withal <S%G907><s%> shall ye be baptized <S%G907><s%> :

But <S%G1161><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> left hand <S%G2176><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine <S%G1699><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> ; but <S%G235><s%> it shall be given to them for whom <S%G3739><s%> it is prepared <S%G2090><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they <S%G756>began<s%> to be much <S%G23>displeased<s%> <S%G4012>with<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>.
